messages.content: I will send you a text extracted through web scraping. I want you to summarize it in a single clear and concise sentence, maintaining the essential meaning. The sentence will be stored in a library of tools associated with different URLs. Do not add explanations or additional text, just the summary. Expected output example: "Artificial Intelligence to extract text from an image". Content to summarize:{{2.text}}
